subject: Basketball (College)
Homosexuality
Discrimination
Women and Girls
Basketball
lead_paragraph: A revelation by Brittney Griner, the No. 1 pick in the W.N.B.A. draft, drew little notice, nothing close to the surge in attention expected to follow a male athlete’s coming out.
snippet: A revelation by Brittney Griner, the No. 1 pick in the W.N.B.A. draft, drew little notice, nothing close to the surge in attention expected to follow a male athlete’s coming out.
